cause.description:
Kidney cancer is estimated to affect over fifty million people in 2007. This disease is all too often not talked about. People need to know the causes, preventions, and possible cures for this awful disease. Please help us in research to help find a cure and to stop this cancer before it takes many more lives.
1. Help us raise awareness!
2. Help us end this disease!
3. Stop this before it takes more lives!
cause.mission: help raise awareness and fund research for this disease.
cause.name: Kidney Cancer Research
